## Description {#details}

An analysis that produces <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo">MachineModuleInfo</a></code> for a module.

This does not produce its own <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo">MachineModuleInfo</a> because we need a consistent <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo">MachineModuleInfo</a> to keep ownership of MachineFunctions regardless of analysis invalidation/clearing. So something outside the analysis infrastructure must own the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo">MachineModuleInfo</a>.

Definition at line 193 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinemoduleinfo-h">MachineModuleInfo.h</a>.
